page.title: 01Gazetteer
page.content: The land in our area is mostly arable fields. { Baldinnie}consists of a few privately owned cottages and farm buildings. It lies one and a half miles from Ceres and as it is 142 metres above sea level there are very good views of the surrounding countryside. { Ceres}is situated in a small hollow seven miles from St. Andrews, the home of golf. It has not changed much over the years and has many historical features. { Coaltown of Callange} now exists as only a couple of cottages compared to the number of miners ' houses there were when the mine was open. Two hundred years ago an aviator called Lunardi landed near this place. { Pitscottie} is largely residential, with a population of approximately sixty people.
